Together, we will support our clients with turn-key solutions for new installations or rehabilitation of existing ones. In addition, HP Handling offers feasibility studies, full customisations and financing support while FLS Solutions (FLS Trading) and the FLS Group will contribute a local network of potential clients, regional engineering and manufacturing partners as well as tailor-made logistical concepts. <\/p>","saveContent":"

This partnership is the combination of two expert companies each bringing their strengths into the cooperation perfectly supplementing each other\u201d, said Christoph Campbell, MD of FLS Solutions. \u201cWe are currently hiring a technical sales manager specifically to support HP Handling and their systems to supplement our existing sales, back-office and logistic team. This is a very exciting development for us and we are very much looking forward to supporting our clients in their projects together with HP Handling.\u201d <\/p>","saveContent":"

wpPost.title: New partnership with HP Handling

seo.title: New partnership with HP Handling - FLS
seo.opengraphTitle: New partnership with HP Handling - FLS
seo.opengraphDescription: FLS Solutions (FLS Trading) is proud to announce that on 1st July 2021, we have been appointed the agent for HP Handling SRL for Thailand and Vietnam. Founded in Italy, HP Handling, is an industry leader in engineering and manufacturing integrated solutions for the handling of grain, flours, meals and dry bulk materials. Together, we Continue reading FLS News HP Handling 3

blocks.name: core/paragraph
blocks.saveContent: FLS Solutions (FLS Trading) is proud to announce that on 1st July 2021, we have been appointed the agent for HP Handling SRL for Thailand and Vietnam.

blocks.name: core/paragraph
blocks.saveContent: Founded in Italy, HP Handling, is an industry leader in engineering and manufacturing integrated solutions for the handling of grain, flours, meals and dry bulk materials.

blocks.name: core/paragraph
blocks.saveContent: Together, we will support our clients with turn-key solutions for new installations or rehabilitation of existing ones. In addition, HP Handling offers feasibility studies, full customisations and financing support while FLS Solutions (FLS Trading) and the FLS Group will contribute a local network of potential clients, regional engineering and manufacturing partners as well as tailor-made logistical concepts.

blocks.name: core/quote
blocks.saveContent: This partnership is the combination of two expert companies each bringing their strengths into the cooperation perfectly supplementing each other, said Christoph Campbell, MD of FLS Solutions. We are currently hiring a technical sales manager specifically to support HP Handling and their systems to supplement our existing sales, back-office and logistic team. This is a very exciting development for us and we are very much looking forward to supporting our clients in their projects together with HP Handling.

blocks.name: core/paragraph
blocks.saveContent: We are looking forward to achieving great things for our customers alongside HP Handling. Our congratulations to all!
